nodes.bodyText:
the the ->the
Maybe log the ids too in the exception?
No need for Javadoc on the implementation, it's already on the interface.
Move the definition of docs further down, just before its use.
Please rename to WorkflowActivationFilterTest.
protected (same below)
Setting the title is probably not necessary for the test.
Please do a static import of all the assert* methods.

Please put ctx.getCoreSession(), workflowRequest.getAttachedDocumentIds() and workflowRequest.getWorkflowModelName(), which are used several times, in local variables.
getContext().getCoreSession() could also use the same session local variable.
Same comment about local variables than in WorkflowObject.
final can be removed while we're changing this code.
I'm not sure about FORBIDDEN here, does @nelsonsilva or @nuxeo/platform have an opinion with respect to REST API best practices? Maybe a 400?
@michaelva after some discussions it seems that Status.BAD_REQUEST would be better.
To remove.
